result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Ryan Michael Turzinski
Current: 500 Forest Street, c/o Marathon County Jail, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 03-22-2016)
Prior: 12403 Woodland Dr, Wausau, WI 54401

Clerk Cheree
Cases 14CF978, 14CM358, 15CF85, 15CF803 and 16CF1 called: 4:22pm
State appears by ADA S.Brubacher.  Def appears in person and with Atty Barry Cohen.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW; Written DEJ agreement filed.

State moves for leave of court to File AMended Criminal Complaint in 14CF978 - COURT Grants

State moves to:
14CF978 - Cts. 1, 3 and 4 and 5>>D&RI
14CF978 - Ct. 3>>DISMISS
15CF803>>D&RI entire file
16CF1>>D&RI entire file
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
14CM358 - Ct. 1 (OWI 2nd)>>GUILTY
14CF978 - Ct. 2 (OWI 3rd)>>GUILTY
15CF85 - Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>GUILTY
15CF85 - Ct. 2 (CDTP)>>GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.
State makes statement on sentencing; Atty Cohen makes statement on sentencing; Defendant makes statement.

---14CM258>>$1415 inclusive; 30 days MCJ w/huber for work/treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification system -- MAY NOT BE SERVED ON EMP per COURT order, to begin 1/28/16 at 8:00pm; 14 month DL Rev w/credit; AODA; Any vehicles titled and registered in the defendant's name are ordered to have IID installed and IID is ordered on defendant him/herself, both for a period of 14 months; IID to be installed within 14 days; $50 IID surcharge to be paid; Absolute sobriety except as prescribed to defendant.

---14CF978>>Sentence w/held; 2 years Probation.
CONDITIONS: $1494 inclusive; 11 months MCJ w/huber for work/treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification system -- MAY NOT BE SERVED ON EMP per COURT order, consecutive to 14CM2528, to begin 1/28/16 at 8:00pm; 27 month DL Rev w/credit; AODA and follow through with all recommendations; Any vehicles titled and registered in the defendant's name are ordered to have IID installed and IID is ordered on defendant him/herself, both for a period of 27 months; IID to be installed within 14 days; $50 IID surcharge to be paid; Absolute sobriety except as prescribed to defendant.

---15CF85 - Ct. 2>>Sentence w/held; 1 year probation, concurrent to all other sentences; 
CONDITIONS: CC (restitution paid); 100 hours of C.S.; Absolute sobriety except as prescribed to defendant.
---15CF85 - Ct. 1>>  COURT w/holds finding and entry of guilt - COURT adopts written deferred entry of judgment agreement as signed by all parties and submitted to COURT.
COURT defers matter for a period of 2 years for defendant to comply with all terms and conditions of written DEJ agreement.
If defendant is in full compliance with all terms and conditions of written DEJ agreement within that time frame and obtains no new criminal charges, State to DISMISS Ct.1
DEOJ RH>> 1/19/18 at 1:10pm w/DA.
Bond continues.

Adj: 5:02pm
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
